text: وَيَقُولُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَهَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ ٱلَّذِينَ أَقْسَمُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ جَهْدَ أَيْمَـٰنِهِمْ ۙ إِنَّهُمْ لَمَعَكُمْ ۚ حَبِطَتْ أَعْمَـٰلُهُمْ فَأَصْبَحُوا۟ خَـٰسِرِينَ

translation.en.sahih: And those who believe will say, "Are these the ones who swore by Allah their strongest oaths that indeed they were with you?" Their deeds have become worthless, and they have become losers.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan orang-orang yang beriman akan mengatakan: "Inikah orang-orang yang bersumpah sungguh-sungguh dengan nama Allah, bahwasanya mereka benar-benar beserta kamu?" Rusak binasalah segala amal mereka, lalu mereka menjadi orang-orang yang merugi.
